# horizontalPagination

**Instance Property**

The horizontal pagination mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var horizontalPagination: NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Pagination modes described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintInfo/PaginationMode].

## Pagination

- **verticalPagination**: The vertical pagination to the specified mode.
- **NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode**: Constants that specify the different ways in which an image is divided into pages.
